The pelagic argosy sights land.
   ⸻ Gene Wolfe
Above is a three-em dash, for testing it's present in the generated fonts

Plus some other Unicode characters:
Kanji (漢字) -- from Wikipedia
Vietnamese has 12 vowels (nguyên âm) and 17 consonants (phụ âm) -- also Wikipedia
Modern Standard Hindi (Hindi: आधुनिक मानक हिन्दी, Ādhunik Mānak Hindī) -- also Wikipedia
